channel.title: Custom client background
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm currently working on a new custom client. I've downloaded csk client (from SWAT) as a basis client, but when I wanted to change the background it says:
Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading TeleScape To fix this try the follwing (in order) 1: Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading 2: Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options 3:Try using a different game-world 4:Try rebooting your computer 5:Try selecting a defferent version of Java from the play-game menu
Before I wanted to change the background it worked fine, but now I've tried to change it that error pops up. I don't know what code I've done wrong.
Thanks,

item.title: Custom client background
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

Oh thanks,

thought I could change all things called ‘SWAT’ into my own server name.
But I know understand it thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom client background
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

make sure the name of ur client background is THE SAME as the one before

so if it was SWAT.png
u have to call it back SWAT.PNG

if u want to change the name go to class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java

Read full topic

item.title: Custom client background
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

Hello,

I’m currently working on a new custom client.
I’ve downloaded csk client (from SWAT) as a basis client, but when I wanted to change the background it says:

Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading TeleScape
To fix this try the follwing (in order)
1: Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading
2: Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options
3:Try using a different game-world
4:Try rebooting your computer
5:Try selecting a defferent version of Java from the play-game menu

Before I wanted to change the background it worked fine, but now I’ve tried to change it that error pops up. I don’t know what code I’ve done wrong.

Thanks,

Read full topic
